languages.text: {n}Энрих делает долгую затяжку, выкуривая папиросу до половины.{/n} "Я не знаю, Лорд-капитан. Я просто не знаю. Слишком много хороших людей пожрал проклятый варп, и он никогда не насытится. Тяжело об этом думать".

{n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the lho-stick in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."
languages.original_text: {n}Энрих делает долгую затяжку, выкуривая папиросу до половины.{/n} "Я не знаю, Лорд-капитан. Я просто не знаю. Слишком много хороших людей пожрал проклятый варп, и он никогда не насытится. Тяжело об этом думать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich takes a long puff, smoking the cigarette halfway out.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

{n}Einrich takes a long puff, smoking the cigarette halfway out.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

{n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the cigarette in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

{n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the cigarette in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

{n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the lho-stick in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

{n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the lho-stick in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

languages.text: {n}Einrich tire une bouffée si longue que la moitié de son cigalho se consume.{/n} « J'en sais rien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est un mystère. Ce foutu Warp a englouti bien des braves, et je doute qu'il soit rassasié un jour. Ça me fait mal rien que d'y penser. »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the lho-stick in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich tire une bouffée si longue que la moitié de son cigalho se consume.{/n} « J'en sais rien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est un mystère. Ce foutu Warp a englouti bien des braves, et je doute qu'il soit rassasié un jour. Ça me fait mal rien que d'y penser. »

languages.text: {n}Einrich da una larga calada que consume medio cigarrillo.{/n} «No sé, Lord Capitán. No tengo ni idea. Tanta gente buena devorada por la maldita disformidad y nunca está satisfecha. No me gusta pensar en ello».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the lho-stick in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich da una larga calada que consume medio cigarrillo.{/n} «No sé, Lord Capitán. No tengo ni idea. Tanta gente buena devorada por la maldita disformidad y nunca está satisfecha. No me gusta pensar en ello».

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇猛吸了一大口麻烟，一下子吸掉了半支。{/n}“我不清楚，舰长大人，我是真的不清楚。这该死的亚空间不知吞噬了多少好人，它永远都不知满足。这种事情我真的不愿意去想。”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the lho-stick in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇猛吸了一大口烟，一下子吸掉了半支。{/n}“我不清楚，舰长大人，我是真的不清楚。这该死的亚空间不知吞噬了多少好人，它永远都不知满足。这种事情我真的不愿意去想。”

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒは長い息を吸い、アイホスティックの半分を吸いつくした。{/n}「分かりません、ロード・キャプテン。ただ、分からないんです。あまりにも多くの善良な男たちが、クソみたいな<歪み>に食い尽くされてきました。なかなか難しい状況です」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the lho-stick in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒは長い息を吸い、煙草の半分を吸いつくした。{/n}「分かりません、ロード・キャプテン。ただ、分からないんです。あまりにも多くの善良な男たちが、クソみたいな<歪み>に食い尽くされてきました。なかなか難しい状況です」

languages.text: {n}Einrich zieht so lange an seinem Lho-Stab.{/n} "Ich weiß es nicht, Lord Captain. Ich weiß es schlicht nicht. Zu viele gute Männer wurden schon von dem verfluchten Warp verschlungen, und sein Hunger wird doch niemals gestillt. Es ist schwer, daran zu denken."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the lho-stick in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich zieht so lange an seiner Zigarette, dass sie in einem Zug zur Hälfte abbrennt.{/n} "Ich weiß es nicht, Lord Captain. Ich weiß es schlicht nicht. Zu viele gute Männer wurden schon von dem verfluchten Warp verschlungen, und sein Hunger wird doch niemals gestillt. Es ist schwer, daran zu denken."

languages.text: {n}Einrich, çok derin bir nefes alıp tek seferde liho dalının yarısını bitiriyor.{/n} "Bilmiyorum Lord Kaptan. Bilmiyorum gerçekten. Kahrolası öteboyut, çok fazla iyi adamımızı tüketti ve asla doymuyor. Düşünmesi bile zor."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich takes a long puff, burning up half the lho-stick in one go.{/n} "I don't know, Lord Captain. I simply don't know. Too many good men have been devoured by the damned warp, and it will never be sated. It's hard to think about it."
